item.description:
In this talk, we'll define energy as how self-aware a person is to what's going on within & around them. There are two types of approaches to how energy works for us -- it's either destructive or creative. Each moment, we have the conscious choice regarding which type we want more of in our lives  -- and the choice would seen obvious, right? But something gets in the way that blocks us from experiencing the higher, more vibrant type of energy we really want.

This talk is about understanding, re-framing and overcoming what stops us from experiencing the creative energy that allows us to live with less fear and self-doubt. We'll explore the four main reasons we self-sabotage and what to do when those energy blocks pop-up. Overcoming these four destructive habits leads to greater happiness, success and deeper sense of life mastery.

Rachel O'h-Uiginn of Undercurrent Coaching is a trained and certified life-coach through the Institute for Professional Excellence in Coaching (iPEC). Rachel works primarily with Millennial women on self-esteem, career & personal development issues. Through positive psychology & coaching tools, Rachel helps clients capitalize on their strengths and achieve desired outcomes to end the cycle of intimidation, guilt and fear that comes up around making positive life changes.

For more information, please visit www.undercurrentcoaching.com



We will be meeting from 7:00pm-8:30pm in the back room of Panera Bread.

Panera is in a plaza of shops, next to Marshalls.

See you there!

Ellen
Organizer
617-750-4830

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Channeling Energy: 4 habits that ruin your life - Speaker Rachel O’h-Uiginn, CPC
